System Tokens #

Color #

Background #

color-background-surface
#1b2d3e

The background color of surface panels.

color-background-base
#101923

The background color of base elements, like the app or popup menus.

color-background-header
#172635

The background color for the header of surface elements, including dialog and table headers.

color-background-surface-selected
#1c3f5e

Used to show the selected state of a surface background

color-background-surface-hover
#1c3851

The background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are hovered over.

color-background-critical
#ff5f60

color-background-serious
#ffcc57

color-background-caution
#fded61

color-background-normal
#99f666

color-background-standby
#5ce2ff

color-background-off
#bbc1c9

color-background-interactive-default
#4dacff

The primary color used for interactive elements.

color-background-interactive-hover
#92cbff

The hover color used for interactive elements.

Text #

Aa
color-text-primary
#ffffff

The primary color used for text within the application.

Aa
color-text-secondary
#d4d8dd

The color used for text when less emphasis is needed.

Aa
color-text-placeholder
#a4abb6

The text color used for placeholder text in input and form fields.

Aa
color-text-inverse
#080c11

The color used for text on reversed backgrounds.

Aa
color-text-white
#ffffff

Text that is white across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes.

Aa
color-text-black
#000000

Text that is black across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes.

Aa
color-text-critical
#ff3838

Aa
color-text-serious
#ffb302

Aa
color-text-caution
#fce83a

Aa
color-text-normal
#56f000

Aa
color-text-standby
#64d9ff

Aa
color-text-off
#a4abb6

Aa
color-text-interactive-default
#4dacff

The primary color used for interactive elements.

Aa
color-text-interactive-hover
#92cbff

The hover color used for interactive elements.

Border #

color-border-critical
#ff3838

color-border-serious
#ffb302

color-border-caution
#fce83a

color-border-normal
#56f000

color-border-standby
#64d9ff

color-border-off
#a4abb6

color-border-interactive-default
#4dacff

The primary color used for interactive elements.

color-border-interactive-hover
#92cbff

The hover color used for interactive elements.

---- #

Classification #

Classification colors represent the government markings and are very intentionally set. Do not use these as part of your UI.

color-classification-topsecretsci
#fce83a

The color used to indicate the Top Secret/SCI classification.

color-classification-topsecret
#ff8c00

The color used to indicate the Top Secret classification.

color-classification-secret
#c8102e

The color used to indicate the Secret classification.

color-classification-confidential
#0033a0

The color used to indicate the Confidential classification.

color-classification-cui
#502b85

The color used to indicate the CUI classification.

color-classification-unclassified
#007a33

The color used to indicate the Unclassified classification.
